verses.verse: O come, O come, Immanuel, And ransom captive Israel That mourns in lonely exile here Until the Son of God appear.
verses.refrain: Rejoice! Rejoice! Immanuel Shall come to thee, O Israel!
verses.verse: O come, Thou Wisdom from on high, And order all things, far and nigh; To us the path of knowledge show, And cause us in her ways to go.
